Articles.Content: When I built my airplane and went to launch, either runway, there is space debris blocking the runways. I've been to the tracking station and destroyed all the debris it showed and yet there it is, a space module and some other stuff. I can't get through it but I can get around it. Just wondering. I really wish I could insert this screen shot because I don't have URL.

I have been using https://postimages.org/ to get my screenshots up. Real quick and easy.

26 minutes ago, kellerlk4 said:

When I built my airplane and went to launch, either runway, there is space debris blocking the runways. I've been to the tracking station and destroyed all the debris it showed and yet there it is, a space module and some other stuff. I can't get through it but I can get around it. Just wondering. I really wish I could insert this screen shot because I don't have URL.

I often hit random things on the ground. Is the debris visible? I'm sure there's still some major ground contact bugs to be worked out.

I also found that if I had a craft with to light of suspension, the wheels would bottom out as I gained speed. At least, I think that's happening... I'm still experimenting with that one.

Edited March 22, 2023 by Socraticat

You'll have to build a bulldozer and get Bob out there to clear it.

 

This sounds like a fun project, actually...
